channel.title: Droping problems in 317 client
channel.description:
I am having dropping problems... I think it might be in the client.java (where I could fix it?) like when I drop Items, nothing apears on the ground. it just dissapears. I'm not completely sure.. but I am also having Owner rights problems, like I am owner and I can't spawn NPC'S and when I "::yell" it has beside my name "[Co-Owner]" so, yeah...
thanks a ton! :D

haha man, I doubt it lol, when NPC’s drop stuff, it wont let me pick it up, so i guess not, what do i search for?
